Title: Hansgrohe Ecostat exposed thermostatic bath shower mixer tap Chrome Plated
Description: Made of high quality materials and packed with features, the Hansgrohe Ecostat bath mixer is designed for exposed installation and is ideal for luxury bathrooms. With AirPower technology users will enjoy softly aerated, splash-free spray while a ceramic cartridge makes control effortlessly precise. The QuickClean rub-clean aerator makes removal of limescale easy, keeping this smart chrome wall-mounted bath tap clean and shining for years.

Title: Grohe Grohtherm 1000 Cosmopolitan thermostatic bath shower mixer tap
Description: With inbuilt thermostatic technology, the Grohe Grohtherm 1000 Cosmopolitan bath/shower mixer is ultra-safe to use and protected against backflow, ideal for family bathrooms. Supplied with dirt strainers and chromed scale rings, this smart, intuitive mixer has been finished in Grohe's trademark StarLight chrome for easier cleaning and long lasting shine.

Title: Hansgrohe Ecostat thermostatic bath tap Chrome
Description: Made of long-lasting brass with a smart chrome finish, the Hansgrohe Ecostat thermostatic bath tap uses shower technology to blend water and air for soft, luxuriant delivery and efficient water use. A thermostatic valve ensures comfort and safety as you shower.

Title: Scudo Thermostaic BSM Wall and Deck Mounted
Description: TMV approved, the Scudo thermostatic BSM monobloc mixer tap has a thermostatic cartridge for safer, scald-free operation. Suitable for operating pressures of 0.5 to 5 bar, this smart chrome tap is suitable for deck or wall mounting, allowing for complete flexibility in any bathroom.
